definition: legal person/corporation/see also 自然人[zi4 ran2 ren2]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: An enterprise as a legal person shall conduct operations within the range approved and registered.
sentences.chinese: 企业法人应当在核准登记的经营范围内从事经营。

sentences.english: A privately-run school shall have the qualifications of a legal person.
sentences.chinese: 民办学校应当具备法人条件。

sentences.english: A Master policy covering different subject-matters insured of the same legal person.
sentences.chinese: 对于涵盖同一法人的不同保险标的的统括保单。
法官，5比4，推翻法人献金限制。

sentences.english: I am an initiator of several corporative standards.
sentences.chinese: 我是几个法人标准的发起者。

sentences.english: It is necessary to make clear the independent juridical person status of owners committee.
sentences.chinese: 未来的发展趋势应是明确业主大会的独立法人地位。

sentences.english: The earthquake-hit regions will be exempt from the hike, the central bank said.
sentences.chinese: 央行还表示地震重灾区法人金融机构暂不涨价。

sentences.english: Please ensure that all the account holder(s) or authorized signatories sign this exchange form.
sentences.chinese: 请帐户持有人或法人代表于此处签名。

sentences.english: The original of The Corporate Business License should be laid up in an eye-catching place of the company's residence.
sentences.chinese: 营业执照正本应放在企业法人住所醒目的位置。

sentences.english: The law enforcement officer searched a proptosis there and then illegal line operation of movement of goods document.
sentences.chinese: 执法人员当场搜出了非法生产经营以来的运货单据。

sentences.english: But there is an irregular operating mechanism in legal person governance.
sentences.chinese: 但在法人治理结构中职工持股会运作不规范。

sentences.english: We effectively safeguarded the lawful rights and interests of Chinese nationals and corporations overseas.
sentences.chinese: 有效维护我国公民和法人在海外的合法权益。

sentences.english: However, the quango has been criticised for being too close to government.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这个政府的特殊法人被批评太过亲近政府。

sentences.english: Any Act travelling beyond the scope thus set for the corporation's activities would be invalid, and not binding on the corporation.
sentences.chinese: 任何行为超出公司范围的都无效，而对法人无拘束力。

sentences.english: Administrative law enforcers shall enforce law impartially.
sentences.chinese: 行政执法人员应当秉公执法。

sentences.english: He has joined the corporate law firm of Wachtell, Lipton, Rosen &Katz.
sentences.chinese: 他加入了利普顿，罗森法人律师事务所。

definition: (law) legal representative of a corporation (e.g. chairman of the board of a company, principal of a school etc)
natural person (law)/see also 法人[fa3 ren2]
to be qualified (to bring a complaint, lawsuit etc) (law)
